'''1.21.9 Pre-Release 3''' (known as '''1.21.9-pre3''' in the launcher) is the third pre-release for [[Java Edition 1.21.9]], released on September 22, 2025,<ref name=mcnet>{{Mcnet|minecraft-1-21-9-pre-release-3|Minecraft 1.21.9 Pre-Release 3|September 22, 2025}}</ref> which fixes two bugs related to [[copper golem]]s.

== Fixes ==
{{fixes|project=MC|fixedin=1.21.9-pre3
|;dev
|301963|Copper golems cause huge lag spikes when checking chests.
|301990|Copper golem statues cause culling issues when placed above certain blocks.
}}</onlyinclude>
